value.title: The Best Machine Learning Startups To Work For In 2021 According To Glassdoor
value.excerpt: AVORA, Codesmith, FairMarkIT, Protenus and Ravelin are the most likely to be recommended by their employees to friends looking for a machine learning startup to work for in 2021 based on each company's Glassdoor ratings.

value.title: CSIRO to use artificial intelligence, machine learning, and sensors to end plastic waste
value.excerpt: The Commonwealth Scientific and Industrial Research Organisation (CSIRO) has announced partnerships with Microsoft, Hobart City Council, and Chemistry Australia to address -- and attempt to end -- Australia's plastics waste issue.

value.title: How Can We Balance Progress And Privacy With Machine Learning?
value.excerpt: It’s helpful to shift this conversation from AI as a whole to the more specific domain of machine learning (ML), and how we can harness its advantages and minimize its drawbacks. Machine Learning is a subset of AI that describes how computer algorithms get better at solving their domain specific problems by leveraging large data sets with which to train themselves.

value.title: How leveraging AI and machine learning can give startups a competitive edge

value.title: AWS launches next-gen GPU instances for machine learning
value.excerpt: AWS has launched its latest GPU-equipped instances aimed at machine learning and high-performance computing (HPC) workloads. Called P4d, the new instances come ten years the first set of GPU instances were launched.

value.title: Brainome launches product to optimize machine learning development process
value.excerpt: Brainome's new product, Daimensions, seeks to eliminate brute-force aspects of machine learning model development, integrate with existing CI/CD infrastructure and generate small ML models that can run efficiently on commodity hardware.

value.title: Amazon EC2 P4d instances for pushing machine learning boundaries now available
